summary.span: 提供瀏覽器環境相關資訊的協助程式類別，XAML 瀏覽器應用程式 (XBAP) 裝載於該環境中。

span.span: A helper class that provides information about the browser environment in which a XAML browser application (XBAP) application is hosted.

summary.span: 傳回物件的參考，該物件可用於透過主瀏覽器的 OLE 容器介面 (例如，IOleClientSite::GetContainer();) 存取該瀏覽器。

span.span: Returns a reference to an object that can be used to access the host browser via its OLE container interfaces (for example, IOleClientSite::GetContainer();).

value.span: 可以轉換成 的物件。

summary.span: 如果是在框架中裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，則取得指令碼物件，以便提供對 HTML 視窗物件、自訂函式和 HTML 網頁全域變數的存取權。

span.span: Gets a script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame.

value.span: 如果在框架中裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，則為提供對 HTML 視窗物件、自訂函式和 HTML 網頁全域變數之存取的指令碼物件，否則為 。

span.span: A script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用所傳回物件，您可以存取屬性、 方法和事件的 HTML 視窗物件、 指令碼函式直接呼叫，或存取全域變數。With the returned object, you can access the properties, methods, and events of the HTML window object, call a script function directly, or access a global variable. 若要存取這些項目語法會使用熟悉的點標記法。The syntax to access these items uses the familiar dot notation. 如需視窗物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[window 物件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274)動態 HTML (DHTML) 文件中。For more information about the window object, see [window object](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274) in the Dynamic HTML (DHTML) documentation. 屬性會傳回`null`如果框架巡覽至跨網域位置。The property returns `null` if the frame is navigated to from a cross-domain location. 這項功能可以關閉 Internet Explorer 的設定**ScriptInteropDisallow**登錄值。This feature can be turned off for Internet Explorer by setting the **ScriptInteropDisallow** registry value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取物件，並關閉瀏覽器視窗。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the object and close the browser window. [!code-xaml[XbapBrowserInterop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/cs/page1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[XbapBrowserInterop#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/cs/page1.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[XbapBrowserInterop#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/vb/page1.xaml.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsBrowserHosted As Boolean
public: static property bool IsBrowserHosted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指定目前的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式是否由瀏覽器裝載。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application is browser hosted.

value.span: 如果應用程式由瀏覽器所裝載則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is browser hosted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以是主機無從驗證，因此，可以載入數種不同的主機，包括、 ，或瀏覽器。A can be host agnostic and, consequently, can be loaded into several different types of hosts, including a , a , or a browser. 發生這種情況您有程式庫組件包含一或多個頁面，且這是由多個獨立部署所參考的和可瀏覽 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) 裝載應用程式。This can happen when you have a library assembly that contains one or more pages, and which is referenced by multiple standalone and browsable ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) host applications. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來判斷如果裝載於瀏覽器。The following example demonstrates how to use to determine if a is hosted in a browser. [!code-csharp[HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets#IsBrowserHostedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#isbrowserhostedcode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets#IsBrowserHostedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#isbrowserhostedcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含僅如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]應用程式。The property contains only a for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] applications. 如需屬性，請參閱。For an example of the property, see .
